entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon.
